text: Monthey is the capital of the district of Monthey in the canton of Valais in Switzerland. As of 2004, Monthey had a population is of 15,118 people (Montheysans). Monthey is located on the west side of the Rh√¥ne valley, south to Lake Geneva. Monthey is important to Swiss industry, with many important companies including chemical companies. The city is close to the famous winter sports region, the Portes du Soleil. ==References== ==Other websites== * Monthey Homepage Category:Municipalities in Monthey Category:Cities in Switzerland
